name: Astrology
description: Interpretation of celestial movements for earthly meaning

name: Natal_Astrology
description: Interpretation of celestial positions at birth to describe personality or life events.

name: Horary_Astrology
description: Answering specific questions based on the time a question is asked and celestial positions.

name: Electional_Astrology
description: Choosing optimal times for events based on celestial configurations.

name: Mundane_Astrology
description: Predicting world events or societal trends based on celestial movements.

name: Medical_Astrology
description: Linking celestial influences to health and medical conditions.
